name: Pizza Puffs
description: Are you ready to cook you very first recipe? in this fun cooking game, barbie will show you each step and you are going to make some yummy pizza puffs today. mix several ingredients together and make sure you stir them very well. prepare the baking pan and put the composition into the muffin cups. put the baking pan into the oven and check the clock. in order to make the pizza puffs more delicious, prepare a yummy sauce and sprinkle some basil on the top. this is barbie's secret! practice your cooking skills and have fun in the kitchen
